procedural_fairness: Applicants bear the burden to provide all relevant information. Visa officers are not obligated to engage in dialogue about completeness unless concerns involve credibility or genuineness.
evidence_assessment: Concerns about insufficient evidence proving full-time student status
decision_outcome: Court dismissed the application for judicial review, upholding the Visa Officer's decision.
standard_of_review: Judicial review filed by applicants challenging the Visa Officer's decision; court analyzed procedural fairness.
immigration_status: Visa denial due to lack of sufficient evidence showing dependency as per regulations.
